# ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è VR-FINGER: TecHeroes Interactive Hero Discovery

An innovative hand-tracking web application for interactive hero presentations with automatic text sequencing and idle mode. Discover 10 unique TecHeroes through gesture-based interactions!

![TecHeroes VR-FINGER](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-1.1.0-blue) ![MediaPipe](https://img.shields.io/badge/MediaPipe-Hands-green) ![WebRTC](https://img.shields.io/badge/WebRTC-Camera-orange)

## üìã Project Overview

This application leverages Google's MediaPipe Hand-Tracking technology to automatically select heroes through finger gestures and display their motivational texts sequentially. Perfect for touchless presentations and interactive learning environments.

## ‚ú® Key Features

### üéØ Automatic Hero Discovery
- **Finger Gesture** ‚Üí 0.5s Timer ‚Üí **Random Hero Selection**
- **10 TecHeroes** with 3 unique motivational texts each
- **Large Hero Images** (130% scaled) on clean white background
- **Seamless Transitions** between different heroes

### üñêÔ∏è Sequential Text Display
| Fingers | Sequence | Timing |
|---------|----------|--------|
| **1 Finger** | Every Word | 0.5s per word |
| **2 Fingers** | Every 2nd Word | 0.5s per word |
| **3 Fingers** | Every 3rd Word | 0.5s per word |
| **4 Fingers** | Every 4th Word | 0.5s per word |
| **5 Fingers** | Every 5th Word | 0.5s per word |

### ü§ñ Intelligent Idle Mode
- **10 Seconds No Hand** ‚Üí Automatic Rest Mode
- **Text Stays Static** (no distracting animations)
- **Hand Detected** ‚Üí Reset ‚Üí New Hero Search
- **Perfect for Presentations** without constant interaction

### ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è TecHeroes Cast
1. **T-Fox** - The Leader (Leadership & Motivation)
2. **John Bot** - The Robohero (Technology & Innovation)
3. **Anna** - The Media Heroine (Digital Literacy)
4. **Mira** - The Code Heroine (Programming)
5. **Matheo** - The Math Master (Mathematics)
6. **Maya** - The Design Heroine (Creativity)
7. **Jim** - The Tech Hero (DIY & Tinkering)
8. **Ronney** - The Powerhouse (Mental Strength)
9. **Farah** - The Agility Expert (Flexibility)
10. **Luca** - The TasteHero (Learning & Experimenting)

## üöÄ Quick Start

### Prerequisites
- **Modern Browser** (Chrome 80+, Firefox 70+, Safari 14+)
- **Webcam** or built-in camera
- **Internet Connection** (for MediaPipe CDN)

### Get Started Immediately
1. **Open File**: Open `index.html` in your browser
2. **Start Camera**: Click button and grant camera permission
3. **Show Hand**: Hold fingers in front of camera
4. **Hero Appears**: After 0.5s, a hero is automatically selected
5. **Text Sequence**: Different finger counts for word highlighting

## üéØ How to Use

### Basic Workflow
```
1Ô∏è‚É£ Show Fingers ‚Üí ‚è±Ô∏è 0.5s Wait ‚Üí ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Hero Appears
2Ô∏è‚É£ More Fingers ‚Üí ‚ú® Word Sequence Starts
3Ô∏è‚É£ Change Count ‚Üí üîÑ Sequence Changes
4Ô∏è‚É£ Zero Fingers ‚Üí ‚è∏Ô∏è Sequence Pauses (Text Stays Readable)
5Ô∏è‚É£ 10s No Hand ‚Üí ü§ñ Idle Mode (Static Text)
6Ô∏è‚É£ Show Hand Again ‚Üí üîÑ New Hero Search
```

### Sequence Modes
- **Always Starts** with **Hero Name** (green highlighted)
- **Cycles Through Text** based on finger count
- **At Text End** ‚Üí jumps back to beginning
- **Continuous** until finger count changes

### Idle Behavior
- **No Highlighting** in rest mode
- **Text Remains Readable** without distraction
- **Automatic Reset** on new hand detection
- **Fresh Start** with new hero

## üõ†Ô∏è Technical Details

### Architecture
```
VR-FINGER/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.html                 # Main Application
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ heros-description.json     # 10 Heroes with 3 Texts Each
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Images/                    # Hero Images (1.png - 10.png)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                  # This Documentation (English)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README-DEUTSCH.md          # German Documentation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ plan.md                    # Development Plan
```

### Hand-Tracking Engine
- **Google MediaPipe Hands** - Precise finger recognition
- **Real-time Processing** - 30+ FPS without visual display
- **Robust Detection** - Works in various lighting conditions
- **Multi-Hand Support** - Up to 2 hands simultaneously

### Performance Features
- **Invisible Tracking** - Camera runs in background
- **White Screen Focus** - Emphasis on hero presentation
- **Smooth Transitions** - Elegant state changes
- **Memory-Efficient** - No trail storage, optimized rendering

## üé® Customization Options

### Timing Adjustments
```javascript
// Hero Selection Timer (Default: 0.5s)
setTimeout(() => this.selectRandomHero(), 500);

// Word Sequence Speed (Default: 0.5s)
setTimeout(() => this.showNextWord(stepSize), 500);

// Idle Timer (Default: 10s)
if (timeSinceLastHand > 10000) this.enterIdleMode();
```

### Visual Customizations
```css
/* Hero Image Size (Currently 130% Scaled) */
.hero-image img {
    transform: scale(1.3);
}

/* Text Highlighting Colors */
.word.highlight {
    color: #ffff00;           /* Yellow for regular words */
    background: rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.2);
}

.hero-name.highlight {
    color: #00ff00 !important; /* Green for hero names */
}
```

### Adding New Heroes


## üêõ Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

**‚ùå Camera Won't Start:**
```
‚úÖ Check browser permissions
‚úÖ Close other camera apps
‚úÖ Use HTTPS (for online deployment)
‚úÖ Enable hardware access
```

**‚ùå Hand Not Detected:**
```
‚úÖ Ensure good lighting
‚úÖ Keep hand 50-100cm from camera
‚úÖ Spread fingers clearly
‚úÖ Avoid dark backgrounds
```

**‚ùå Hero Won't Change:**
```
‚úÖ Wait 10s without hand ‚Üí Idle mode
‚úÖ Then show hand ‚Üí New hero
‚úÖ Or reload page for reset
```

**‚ùå Text Sequence Stutters:**
```
‚úÖ Briefly change finger count
‚úÖ Show zero fingers ‚Üí Reset
‚úÖ New finger count for restart
```
